data.title: Steven E De Souza – Tommy Girard
data.meta_description: Posts about Steven E De Souza written by tommygirard
data.text: After rewatches of The Running Man, The Terminator and T2: Judgment Day I thought it time for a rewatch of the 1985 Arnold Schwarzenegger action movie vehicle, Commando, which I’ve seen innumerable times but not in a long while (and in this case the director’s cut, for what that’s worth). Opening with three seemingly unconnected... Continue Reading →
